cards.name: Absorb

cards.flavor: "Your presumption is your downfall."

cards.name: Addle
cards.text: Choose a color. Target player reveals his or her hand and you choose a card of that color from it. That player discards that card.
cards.flavor:
"I'll wring out your tiny mind like a sponge."
—Urborg witch

cards.name: Æther Rift
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield unless any player pays 5 life.

cards.name: Aggressive Urge
cards.text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The power of the wild, concentrated in a single charge.

cards.name: Agonizing Demise
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

cards.flavor:
"Its stones seem to serve a healing function, but removing them intact is an exhausting process."
—Tolarian research notes

cards.name: Alloy Golem
cards.text:
As Alloy Golem enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Alloy Golem is the chosen color. (It's still an artifact.)
cards.flavor:
"We turned old weapons into new warriors."
—Jhoira, master artificer

cards.name: Ancient Kavu
cards.text: {2}: Ancient Kavu becomes colorless until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Those with the ability to change their nature survived Phyrexia's biological attacks. Everything else died.

cards.name: Ancient Spring
cards.text:
Ancient Spring enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Ancient Spring: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Andradite Leech
cards.text:
Black spells you cast cost {B} more to cast.
{B}: Andradite Leech gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Older specimens are completely encrusted with gems, which serve as both armor and weapons."
—Tolarian research notes

cards.name: Angel of Mercy
cards.text:
Flying
When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
cards.flavor:
"In times like these, people need to be reminded of compassion."
—Sisay

cards.name: Angelic Shield
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"If only an angel's wings could shelter us all."
—Barrin

cards.name: Annihilate
cards.text:
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Whatever Yawgmoth marks, dies. There is no escape."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

cards.name: Archaeological Dig
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Archaeological Dig: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Ardent Soldier
cards.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Vigilance

cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavor:
"Don't laugh. It works."
—Yavimaya ranger

cards.name: Armored Guardian
cards.text:
{1}{W}{W}: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
{1}{U}{U}: Armored Guardian gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

cards.text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"From shards and splinters I call forth my living horde."
—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

cards.name: Assault
cards.text: Assault deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Atalya, Samite Master
cards.text:
{X}, {T}: Choose one —
• Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Spend only white mana this way.
• You gain X life. Spend only white mana this way.
cards.flavor: "Healing is a gift the divine ones have shared with us. It is a sacred trust."

cards.name: Aura Mutation
cards.text: Destroy target enchantment. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is that enchantment's converted mana cost.
cards.flavor:
"Life can be found in all things, even things unnatural."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

cards.name: Aura Shards
cards.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor: Gaea forged her soldiers into self-wielding weapons that struck down all impurities.

cards.name: Backlash
cards.text: Tap target untapped creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to its controller.
cards.flavor: Darigaaz decided his foe would be more useful as a weapon.

cards.name: Barrin's Spite
cards.text: Choose two target creatures controlled by the same player. Their controller chooses and sacrifices one of them. Return the other to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Only vengeance matters now."
—Barrin

cards.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand if that permanent shares a color with the most common color among all permanents or a color tied for most common.

cards.name: Battery

cards.name: Benalish Emissary
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Benalish Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target land.

cards.name: Benalish Heralds
cards.text: {3}{U}, {T}: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The detailed dispatch could be summarized in four words: "Time is running out."

cards.name: Benalish Lancer
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{W} (You may pay an additional {2}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Benalish Lancer was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.

cards.name: Benalish Trapper
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: "I'm up here. You're down there. Now who's the lower life form?"

cards.name: Bend or Break
cards.text: Each player separates all nontoken lands he or she controls into two piles. For each player, one of his or her piles is chosen by one of his or her opponents of his or her choice. Destroy all lands in the chosen piles. Tap all lands in the other piles.

cards.name: Bind
cards.text:
Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"The battlefield is cluttered enough. Be still."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

cards.name: Blazing Specter
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

cards.name: Blind Seer
cards.text: {1}{U}: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I think he sees more than he lets on."
—Gerrard

cards.name: Blinding Light
cards.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.
cards.flavor: An angel's sword impales only the body; her righteousness penetrates the soul.

cards.name: Bloodstone Cameo
cards.text: {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"The stone whispers to me of dragon's fire and darkness. I wish I'd never pried it from the figurehead of that sunken Keldon longship."
—Isel, master carver

cards.name: Blurred Mongoose
cards.text:
Blurred Mongoose can't be countered.
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"The mongoose blew out its candle and was asleep in bed before the room went dark."
—Llanowar fable

cards.name: Bog Initiate
cards.text: {1}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Urborg's magic is strong. Did Urza send you to protect us or to protect against us?"
—Urborg witch, to Barrin

cards.name: Breaking Wave
cards.text:
You may cast Breaking Wave any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Simultaneously untap all tapped creatures and tap all untapped creatures.

cards.name: Breath of Darigaaz
cards.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If Breath of Darigaaz was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

cards.name: Callous Giant
cards.text: If a source would deal 3 or less damage to Callous Giant, prevent that damage.
cards.flavor: "The invasion has awoken slumbering mountains," noted Urza. "Good. We can use all the help we can get."

cards.name: Canopy Surge
cards.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Canopy Surge deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player. If Canopy Surge was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature with flying and each player instead.

cards.name: Capashen Unicorn
cards.text: {1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Capashen Unicorn: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

cards.text: {T}: Search your library for a legendary card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Her leadership forged the Weatherlight's finest crew.

cards.name: Cauldron Dance
cards.text:
Cast Cauldron Dance only during combat.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Chaotic Strike
cards.text:
Cast Chaotic Strike only during combat after blockers are declared.
Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Charging Troll
cards.text:
Vigilance
{G}: Regenerate Charging Troll.
cards.flavor: They stop for nothing, not even the end of a battle.

cards.name: Chromatic Sphere
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Let insight and energy be your guides."

cards.name: Cinder Shade
cards.text:
{B}: Cinder Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{R}, Sacrifice Cinder Shade: Cinder Shade deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

cards.name: Coalition Victory

cards.flavor:
"You can build a perfect machine out of imperfect parts."
—Urza

cards.name: Coastal Tower
cards.text:
Coastal Tower enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: The Capashen built the highest towers in Benalia to afford themselves the best view.

cards.name: Cremate
cards.text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Crimson Acolyte
cards.text:
Protection from red
{W}: Target creature gains protection from red until end of turn.

cards.text:
Flying

Enchant creature

Protection from black

Flying, protection from white

Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another until end of turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

Flying

cards.name: Deliver
cards.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.

cards.name: Dismantling Blow

Kicker {2}{U} (You may pay an additional {2}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
If Dismantling Blow was kicked, draw two cards.

cards.name: Disrupt
cards.text:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card.

cards.text: Return X target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Drake-Skull Cameo
cards.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Dream Thrush

Flying
{T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

cards.text:
Sacrifice a creature or land.
Draw a card.

Flying

No more than one creature can block each turn.

"You think you can stop me?" hissed Tsabo.

Kicker {3}{B} (You may pay an additional {3}{B} as you cast this spell.)

"For what are leaves but countless blades

Enchant permanent
As long as enchanted permanent is red or green, it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this permanent unless you pay its mana cost."
cards.flavor:
"We define the boundaries of reality; they don't define us."
—Teferi

cards.name: Exclude
cards.text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.

"I don't have time for you right now."
—Teferi

cards.name: Exotic Curse
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Domain — Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor:
Fouler than a necromancer's kiss.

Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)

Enchant land

cards.name: Firebrand Ranger
cards.text: {G}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A skilled ranger can glance at the mud on your boots and tell where you last camped.

cards.name: Fires of Yavimaya
cards.text:
Creatures you control have haste.

cards.name: Firescreamer
cards.text: {R}: Firescreamer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: In the dark, it's nearly invisible—until it exhales.

cards.name: Frenzied Tilling
cards.text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"Beneath her scars, Dominaria's beauty yet shines."
—Multani, maro-sorcerer

cards.name: Galina's Knight
cards.text: Protection from red

"Are they on our side?" asked Sisay.
"If they kill Phyrexians they are," replied Gerrard.

cards.name: Geothermal Crevice
cards.text:

{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Geothermal Crevice: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

cards.text:

cards.name: Glimmering Angel
cards.text:
Flying
{U}: Glimmering Angel gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor:
"We turned to see where the blow came from and saw only a distant light."
—Capashen lord

cards.flavor:
"The earth shook, the sky rained fire, and it seemed the world was ending."
—Benalish refugee

cards.name: Goblin Spy
cards.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed.
cards.flavor:
"Isn't he on our side?"
"Yep."
"Why's he spyin' on us?"
"Don't ask."

cards.name: Goham Djinn
cards.text:
{1}{B}: Regenerate Goham Djinn.
Goham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as black is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

cards.name: Halam Djinn
cards.text:
Haste
Halam Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as red is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

cards.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
cards.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor: "I never thought I'd spend my life fighting. I'm a maker, not a destroyer."

cards.name: Harrow
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: No spot in nature is truly barren.

cards.text:

If an instant or sorcery spell of the chosen color would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to its controller instead.
cards.flavor:
"At least they remember me."

cards.text: {2}: Target blue or red creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

—Eladamri, to Gerrard

cards.name: Holy Day

{T}, Sacrifice Irrigation Ditch: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.

"They weren't part of my plan, but Gaea insisted."

cards.name: Kavu Climber
cards.text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.

cards.name: Kavu Lair
cards.text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield, its controller draws a card.
cards.flavor: As a dark rain of Phyrexians fell from the sky, fountains of kavu erupted from the ground.

cards.name: Kavu Monarch
cards.text:
Kavu creatures have trample.
Whenever another Kavu enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.
cards.flavor: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

cards.name: Kavu Runner
cards.text: Kavu Runner has haste as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.

cards.name: Kavu Scout
cards.text: Domain — Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

cards.name: Kavu Titan
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
If Kavu Titan was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.

cards.name: Keldon Necropolis
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Keldon Necropolis deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Liberate
cards.text: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"Not everyone gets a second chance."
—Hanna

cards.name: Lightning Dart
cards.text: Lightning Dart deals 1 damage to target creature. If that creature is white or blue, Lightning Dart deals 4 damage to it instead.
cards.flavor: Broken and punctured by dozens of Phyrexian portals, the angry sky began to spit lightning back at the world.

cards.name: Llanowar Cavalry
cards.text: {W}: Llanowar Cavalry gains vigilance until end of turn.
cards.flavor: For the first time, elves welcomed Benalish soldiers into the forest with something other than arrows.

cards.name: Llanowar Elite
cards.text:
Kicker {8} (You may pay an additional {8} as you cast this spell.)
Trample
If Llanowar Elite was kicked, it enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Llanowar Knight
cards.text: Protection from black
cards.flavor: Her armor and steed were borrowed, but her courage was hers alone.

cards.name: Llanowar Vanguard
cards.text: {T}: Llanowar Vanguard gets +0/+4 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Llanowar rallied around Eladamri's banner and united in his name.

cards.name: Loafing Giant
cards.text: Whenever Loafing Giant attacks or blocks, put the top card of your library into your graveyard. If that card is a land card, prevent all combat damage Loafing Giant would deal this turn.
cards.flavor: "Forget it. I'm not getting up today."

cards.name: Lobotomy
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Lotus Guardian
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Lotus fields are too valuable to leave undefended.

cards.name: Mages' Contest
cards.text: You and target spell's controller bid life. You start the bidding with a bid of 1. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid. If you win the bidding, counter that spell.

cards.name: Malice
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Mana Maze
cards.text: Players can't cast spells that share a color with the spell most recently cast this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Those who know only one path to victory can never hope to triumph."
—The Blind Seer

cards.name: Maniacal Rage
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
cards.flavor: "Remember me?" Tahngarth roared. "Now I'll repay you for my stay on Rath"

cards.name: Manipulate Fate
cards.text:
Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Marauding Knight
cards.text:
Protection from white
Marauding Knight gets +1/+1 for each Plains your opponents control.
cards.flavor:
"They ride our trails as if they were designed to," said the guard.
"They were," replied Gerrard.

cards.name: Metathran Aerostat
cards.text:
Flying
{X}{U}: You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, return Metathran Aerostat to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Metathran Transport
cards.text:
Flying
Metathran Transport can't be blocked by blue creatures.
{U}: Target creature becomes blue until end of turn.

cards.name: Metathran Zombie
cards.text: {B}: Regenerate Metathran Zombie.
cards.flavor:
"Rise, metathran. You shall serve a nobler cause in death."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

cards.name: Meteor Storm
cards.text: {2}{R}{G}, Discard two cards at random: Meteor Storm deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: The storm wasn't an omen. It was the fulfillment of one.

cards.name: Might Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target red or white creature gains trample until end of turn. (If the creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
cards.flavor: "Let my strength harden your resolve."

cards.name: Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer
cards.text:
Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
Molimo, Maro-Sorcerer's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
cards.flavor: "The world calls and I answer."

cards.name: Mourning
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0.
{B}: Return Mourning to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Barrin waited for the nausea to pass or for Urza to say something else. He waited in vain.

cards.name: Nightscape Apprentice
cards.text:
{U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Nightscape Master
cards.text:
{U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
{R}{R}, {T}: Nightscape Master deals 2 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Noble Panther
cards.text: {1}: Noble Panther gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Unlike many hunters, these panthers have no need for camouflage. They're fast enough to catch any prey.

cards.name: Nomadic Elf
cards.text: {1}{G}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

cards.name: Obliterate
cards.text:
Obliterate can't be countered.
Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: For his family, Barrin made a funeral pyre of Tolaria.

cards.name: Obsidian Acolyte
cards.text:
Protection from black
{W}: Target creature gains protection from black until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
The truthful will stand in the gaze of death and escape unharmed.
—Obsidian acolyte creed

cards.name: Opt
cards.text:
Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "We need alternatives, Hanna," yelled Gerrard. "Now"

cards.name: Ordered Migration
cards.text: Domain — Put a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: "Birds reach all parts of the world," said Barrin. "They will make excellent scouts."

cards.name: Orim's Touch
cards.text:
Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.)
Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. If Orim's Touch was kicked, prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to that creature or player this turn instead.

cards.name: Overabundance
cards.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that land produced, and Overabundance deals 1 damage to him or her.

cards.name: Overload
cards.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If Overload was kicked, destroy that artifact if its converted mana cost is 5 or less instead.

cards.name: Pain
cards.text: Target player discards a card.

cards.name: Phantasmal Terrain
cards.text:
Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

cards.name: Phyrexian Altar
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Your life was meaningless, but your death will glorify Yawgmoth."
—Tsabo Tavoc

cards.name: Phyrexian Battleflies
cards.text:
Flying
{B}: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.
cards.flavor: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

cards.name: Phyrexian Delver
cards.text: When Phyrexian Delver enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Phyrexian Infiltrator
cards.text: {2}{U}{U}: Exchange control of Phyrexian Infiltrator and target creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
cards.flavor:
"It is Yawgmoth's will incarnate: an efficient machine that replaces inefficient flesh."
—Tsabo Tavoc

cards.name: Phyrexian Lens
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"There's nothing I wouldn't give to achieve victory. Can you say the same?"
—Tsabo Tavoc, to Gerrard

cards.name: Phyrexian Reaper
cards.text: Whenever Phyrexian Reaper becomes blocked by a green creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: It desires only to help others shed the itchy wet skin of life.

cards.name: Phyrexian Slayer
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Phyrexian Slayer becomes blocked by a white creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: Benalia was only the first nation victimized by Tsabo Tavoc's specialized killers.

cards.name: Pincer Spider
cards.text:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
If Pincer Spider was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Plague Spitter
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
When Plague Spitter dies, Plague Spitter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Plague Spores
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature and target land. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"Breathe deep, Dominaria. Breathe deep and die."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

cards.name: Planar Portal
cards.text: {6}, {T}: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: The sky split, and the air crackled and roiled. The Phyrexian invasion of Dominaria had finally begun.

cards.name: Pledge of Loyalty
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from the colors of permanents you control. This effect doesn't remove Pledge of Loyalty.
cards.flavor: Urza convinced many Dominarians not only to set aside their differences, but to embrace them.

cards.name: Pouncing Kavu
cards.text:
Kicker {2}{R} (You may pay an additional {2}{R} as you cast this spell.)
First strike
If Pouncing Kavu was kicked, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with haste.

cards.name: Power Armor
cards.text: Domain — {3}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor:
"Great peril demands formidable weaponry."
—Urza

cards.name: Prison Barricade
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Kicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} as you cast this spell.)
If Prison Barricade was kicked, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Prison Barricade can attack as though it didn't have defender."

cards.name: Probe
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Draw three cards, then discard two cards.
If Probe was kicked, target player discards two cards.

cards.name: Prohibit
cards.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Counter target spell if its converted mana cost is 2 or less. If Prohibit was kicked, counter that spell if its converted mana cost is 4 or less instead.

cards.name: Protective Sphere
cards.text: {1}, Pay 1 life: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice that shares a color with the mana spent on this activation cost. (Colorless mana prevents no damage.)

cards.name: Psychic Battle
cards.text: Whenever a player chooses one or more targets, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. The player who reveals the card with the highest converted mana cost may change the target or targets. If two or more cards are tied for highest cost, the target or targets remain unchanged. Changing targets this way doesn't trigger abilities of permanents named Psychic Battle.

cards.name: Pulse of Llanowar
cards.text: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.
cards.flavor:
"Gaea's memory is eternal, and she exists in all things."
—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

cards.name: Pure Reflection
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a creature spell, destroy all Reflections. Then that player puts an X/X white Reflection creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the converted mana cost of that spell.

cards.name: Pyre Zombie
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Pyre Zombie is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}{B}. If you do, return Pyre Zombie to your hand.
{1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Pyre Zombie: Pyre Zombie deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Quirion Elves
cards.text:
As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Quirion Sentinel
cards.text: When Quirion Sentinel enters the battlefield, add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: All elvenkind stood against Phyrexia. The Quirion nation deployed its most spiritual adepts, who wielded the power of their native soil.

cards.name: Quirion Trailblazer
cards.text: When Quirion Trailblazer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: "All that matters is the path ahead."

cards.name: Rage Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target black or green creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
cards.flavor: "Let my passion spur your victory."

cards.name: Raging Kavu
cards.text:
Flash
Haste
cards.flavor: It took Yavimaya a thousand years to breed them, but it took only seconds for them to prove their worth.

cards.name: Rainbow Crow
cards.text:
Flying
{1}: Rainbow Crow becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Children claim no two feathers are exactly the same color, then eagerly gather them for proof.

cards.name: Rampant Elephant
cards.text: {G}: Target creature blocks Rampant Elephant this turn if able.
cards.flavor: No matter how righteous the cause, it helps to bring along some muscle.

cards.name: Ravenous Rats
cards.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor: Nothing is sacred to the rats. Everything is simply another meal.

cards.name: Razorfoot Griffin
cards.text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
cards.flavor:
"Do griffins fight to defend their homes or purely for sport?"
—Sisay

cards.name: Reckless Assault
cards.text: {1}, Pay 2 life: Reckless Assault deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor:
"How will you fight an enemy that cares nothing for itself?"
—The Blind Seer

cards.name: Reckless Spite
cards.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
cards.flavor:
"Death is such an exquisite sensation."
—Tsabo Tavoc, Phyrexian general

cards.name: Recoil
cards.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.
cards.flavor: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

cards.name: Recover
cards.text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: As Barrin exhumed his daughter's body, he finally realized the full price of his faith in Urza.

cards.name: Repulse
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "You aren't invited."

cards.name: Restock
cards.text: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Restock.
cards.flavor:
"We hid such stockpiles all over Rath. We should continue that practice here."
—Lin Sivvi

cards.name: Restrain
cards.text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Hanna would give up her own life before she'd abandon the Weatherlight."
—Sisay

cards.name: Reviving Dose
cards.text:
You gain 3 life.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: As healers battled each plague, they learned more about the next.

cards.name: Reviving Vapors
cards.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library and put one of them into your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost. Put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

cards.name: Rewards of Diversity
cards.text: Whenever an opponent casts a multicolored spell, you gain 4 life.
cards.flavor:
"Everything is in place. Nothing can happen that isn't part of my plan."
—Urza

cards.name: Reya Dawnbringer
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: A beacon of hope for a battered army.

cards.name: Riptide Crab
cards.text:
Vigilance
When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.
cards.flavor: It sleeps with its claws open.

cards.name: Rith's Attendant
cards.text: {1}, Sacrifice Rith's Attendant: Add {R}{G}{W} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: "Rith is the claw of the ur-dragon, scattering seeds of devastation."

cards.name: Rith, the Awakener
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{G}. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

cards.name: Rogue Kavu
cards.text: Whenever Rogue Kavu attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "I know how this one feels," said Urza. "It's not like others of its kind and has been shunned for its differences."

cards.name: Rooting Kavu
cards.text: When Rooting Kavu dies, you may exile it. If you do, shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

cards.name: Rout
cards.text:
You may cast Rout any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Ruby Leech
cards.text:
First strike
Red spells you cast cost {R} more to cast.
cards.flavor:
"Its gems didn't stop pulsating until they were completely removed."
—Tolarian research notes

cards.name: Ruham Djinn
cards.text:
First strike
Ruham Djinn gets -2/-2 as long as white is the most common color among all permanents or is tied for most common.

cards.name: Sabertooth Nishoba
cards.text: Trample, protection from blue and from red
cards.flavor: They sneer at the terrestrial dangers found on peaks and shores, eager to prove themselves against new and even mightier foes.

cards.name: Salt Marsh
cards.text:
Salt Marsh enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
Only death breeds in stagnant water.
—Urborg saying

cards.name: Samite Archer
cards.text:
{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{T}: Samite Archer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: "I can preserve ten lives by taking one."

cards.name: Samite Ministration
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice. Whenever damage from a black or red source is prevented this way this turn, you gain that much life.

cards.name: Sapphire Leech
cards.text:
Flying
Blue spells you cast cost {U} more to cast.
cards.flavor:
"The subject's wings are clearly vestigial. We suspect the gems somehow keep it aloft."
—Tolarian research notes

cards.name: Saproling Infestation
cards.text: Whenever a player kicks a spell, you put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: "My army took centuries to gather," remarked Urza. "Yavimaya seems to conjure hers out of thin air."

cards.name: Saproling Symbiosis
cards.text:
You may cast Saproling Symbiosis any time you could cast an instant if you pay {2} more to cast it.
Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each creature you control.

cards.name: Savage Offensive
cards.text:
Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. If Savage Offensive was kicked, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Scarred Puma
cards.text: Scarred Puma can't attack unless a black or green creature also attacks.
cards.flavor: It's not eager to lose the other eye.

cards.name: Scavenged Weaponry
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Scavenged Weaponry enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
cards.flavor: "The Phyrexians have progressed," admired Urza. "Their parts are interchangeable."

cards.name: Scorching Lava
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If Scorching Lava was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

cards.name: Scouting Trek
cards.text: Search your library for any number of basic land cards. Reveal those cards, then shuffle your library and put them on top of it.
cards.flavor:
"I have chosen my path. Who will walk it with me?"
—Eladamri

cards.name: Searing Rays
cards.text: Choose a color. Searing Rays deals damage to each player equal to the number of creatures of that color that player controls.
cards.flavor:
"This is a battle of pawns, for the highest stakes imaginable."
—Urza

cards.name: Seashell Cameo
cards.text: {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor:
"Today a seashell fell from the empty sky here in Kinymu, a hundred leagues from the sea. I'm torn—shall I carve a woman or a bird?"
—Isel, master carver

cards.name: Seer's Vision
cards.text:
Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
Sacrifice Seer's Vision: Look at target player's hand and choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Serpentine Kavu
cards.text: {R}: Serpentine Kavu gains haste until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Under Yavimaya's peaceful facade beat the hearts of many savage beasts.

cards.name: Shackles
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{W}: Return Shackles to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "It could be worse," said Gerrard, looking around. "Well, maybe not."

cards.name: Shimmering Wings
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
{U}: Return Shimmering Wings to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Wings are but fins for swimming the sky."
—Empress Galina

cards.name: Shivan Emissary
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} as you cast this spell.)
When Shivan Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Shivan Harvest
cards.text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target nonbasic land.
cards.flavor:
"The blood of your ancestors ran heavy on this soil. Now it's your turn to sacrifice for the glory of Shiv."
—Viashino heretic

cards.name: Shivan Oasis
cards.text:
Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

cards.name: Shivan Zombie
cards.text: Protection from white
cards.flavor: Barbarians long for a glorious death in battle. Phyrexia was eager to grant that wish.

cards.name: Shoreline Raider
cards.text: Protection from Kavu
cards.flavor:
"This strange new beast makes for an excellent meal. Get me more."
—Empress Galina

cards.name: Simoon
cards.text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.
cards.flavor: Hot wind whipped up as if the weather itself wanted to fight Phyrexians.

cards.name: Skittish Kavu
cards.text: Skittish Kavu gets +1/+1 as long as no opponent controls a white or blue creature.
cards.flavor: Fierce when roused, this breed of kavu is easily distracted by a strong voice or melodic tune.

cards.name: Skizzik
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Trample, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Skizzik unless it was kicked.

cards.name: Sky Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target white or black creature gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
cards.flavor: "Let my wisdom give you wings."

cards.name: Sleeper's Robe
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Slimy Kavu
cards.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Its slime liquefies the ground as efficiently as its fangs shred prey.

cards.name: Slinking Serpent
cards.text: Forestwalk
cards.flavor: It winds its way through undergrowth as easily as it swims through shallows.

cards.name: Smoldering Tar
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, target player loses 1 life.
Sacrifice Smoldering Tar: Smoldering Tar deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

cards.name: Soul Burn
cards.text:
Spend only black and/or red mana on X.
Soul Burn deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before Soul Burn dealt damage, or the creature's toughness.

cards.name: Sparring Golem
cards.text: Whenever Sparring Golem becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

cards.name: Spinal Embrace
cards.text:

Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.

cards.name: Spirit of Resistance
cards.text: As long as you control a permanent of each color, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
cards.flavor:
"Our victory must come from all of Dominaria, or it will not come."
—Urza

cards.name: Spirit Weaver
cards.text: {2}: Target green or blue creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "Let my hope be your shield."

cards.name: Spite
cards.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

{3}{U}, {T}: Tap target creature.

"I have," replied Teferi, "but the alternative is worse."

Draw two cards.

Enchant creature

cards.text:

cards.name: Zanam Djinn

Flying
